attributes.action: All product sold in The United Kingdom bearing The Union Flag should be made within The United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details:
All product sold in The United Kingdom bearing The Union Flag should be made within The United Kingdom.
How can bunting, Jubilee celebration materials be made in china for example as they are, how is that patriotic in any sense at all. Other materials that bear The use of The Union Flag on products also, are trying to instil a false sense of patriotism within the buyer, to make them feel the need to buy the product. A false sense of propaganda. Therefore the bearing of this Flag should only be used where patriotism is being used by the manufacture, not just a marketing ploy.
Also would encourage the production of products within Britain, producing the same result as applying Tariffs from abroad (1902), but without doing so.
